content: Yeah, that sounds like a solid plan. I think it'd be awesome to create a Facebook group for like-minded individuals. I've got a good idea of what kind of content I want to share and the kind of community I want to build. Thanks for the tips! By the way, speaking of social media, I've been thinking about my Instagram account and how I noticed a sudden surge in followers back in early January. Do you think that had anything to do with the fact that I started posting more regularly and engaging with others around that time?
